headline: IQVIA Holdings (NYSE:IQV) Sees 13% Weekly Price Dip Amid Credit Agreement Amendment
summary: IQVIA Holdings (NYSE:IQV) experienced a price decline of 13% last week, coinciding with their decision to amend their Fifth Amended and Restated Credit Agreement by introducing new Term B Dollar Loans, lowering interest rates, and repaying certain Euro loans. This financial maneuver occurred against the backdrop of a turbulent market, which saw the Dow drop 7.9%, the S&P 500 fall 9.1%, and the Nasdaq enter bear market territory due to escalating trade tensions and new tariffs. These broader...
